strapiPost.title: World Class Riding
strapiPost.content:
Mountain bikers and trail advocates carved the foundation for the mountain bike community over 30 years ago, with compounding interest over the past several years. 

  • Count: The latest calculation of mountain bike trails in Arkansas is 1073.74, and that number is constantly growing. Over the past 5 years, trail systems like OZ Trails, Monument Trails, and the Northwoods have created a world class collection. 
  • Economic Impact: Coming to Bentonville spring 2022, a mountain biking school called Bike School Bentonville will offer mountain biking education and skills development to locals and visitors.
